title: (x) Nine Inch Nails [Only] degraded condensed sans - custom degradation {Yves}
content:
Hi Guys:

I wonder if anyone knows wich font is this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132645im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NIN_5552.jpg)

I hope this isn't a custom job...

Thanks in advance!!

Q™ Says: It's all about the fonts!!
author: Quesito

comments.content:
Might be Helvetica Inserat with a reversed N.

- Mike Yanega
The degradation is custom, if that's what you're looking for.

Yeah, I was looking for the exact degradation showed on the image... so I guess you would say: "anotherone font bytes the dust", I better start looking for a similar type to do the job...

Thanks!!

Q™ Says: It's all about the Fonts!!
